Duration: 15s

jobActions.name: Benediction
jobActions.effect: Restores all of a target's HP.

jobActions.name: Afflatus Solace
jobActions.effect:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 800
Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily
Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily

jobActions.name: Asylum
jobActions.effect:
Envelops a designated area in a veil of succor, granting healing over time to self and any party members who enter.
Cure Potency: 100
Duration: 24s
Additional Effect: Increases HP recovery via healing actions on party members in the designated area by 10%

jobActions.name: Stone III
jobActions.effect: Deals earth damage with a potency of 220.

jobActions.name: Assize
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 400 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP and the HP of nearby party members
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Restores 5% of maximum MP

jobActions.name: Thin Air
jobActions.effect:
Next action is executed without MP cost.
Duration: 12s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Tetragrammaton
jobActions.effect:
Restores target's HP.
Cure Potency: 700

jobActions.name: Stone IV
jobActions.effect: Deals earth damage with a potency of 260.

jobActions.name: Divine Benison
jobActions.effect:
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage equivalent to a heal of 500 potency.
Duration: 15s
Maximum Charges: 2

jobActions.name: Plenary Indulgence
jobActions.effect:
Grants Confession to self and nearby party members.
Upon receiving HP recovery via Medica, Medica II, Cure III, or Afflatus Rapture cast by self, Confession triggers an additional healing effect.
Cure Potency: 200
Duration: 10s

jobActions.name: Dia
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 65.
Additional Effect: Unaspected damage over time
Potency: 65
Duration: 30s

jobActions.name: Glare
jobActions.effect: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 290.

jobActions.name: Afflatus Misery
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage to target and all enemies nearby it with a potency of 1,240 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Can only be executed when the Blood Lily is in full bloom.

jobActions.name: Afflatus Rapture
jobActions.effect:
Restores own HP and the HP of all nearby party members.
Cure Potency: 400
Additional Effect: Nourishes the Blood Lily
Healing Gauge Cost: 1 Lily

jobActions.name: Temperance
jobActions.effect:
Increases healing magic potency by 20%, while reducing damage taken by self and all party members within a radius of 50 yalms by 10%.
Duration: 20s

jobActions.name: Glare III
jobActions.effect: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 310.

jobActions.name: Holy III
jobActions.effect:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Stun
Duration: 4s

jobActions.name: Aquaveil
jobActions.effect:
Reduces damage taken by a party member or self by 15%.
Duration: 8s

jobActions.name: Liturgy of the Bell
jobActions.effect:
Places a healing blossom at the designated location and grants 5 stacks of Liturgy of the Bell to self.
Duration: 20s
Taking damage will expend 1 stack of Liturgy of the Bell to heal self and all party members within a radius of 20 yalms.
Cure Potency: 400
The effect of this action can only be triggered once per second.
Any remaining stacks of Liturgy of the Bell will trigger an additional healing effect when time expires or upon executing this action a second time.
Cure Potency: 200 for every remaining stack of Liturgy of the Bell
This action does not share a recast timer with any other actions.

roleActions.name: Repose
roleActions.effect:
Afflicts target with Sleep.
Duration: 30s
Cancels auto-attack upon execution.

roleActions.name: Esuna
roleActions.effect: Removes a single detrimental effect from target.

roleActions.name: Swiftcast
roleActions.effect:
Next spell is cast immediately.
Duration: 10s

roleActions.name: Lucid Dreaming
roleActions.effect:
Gradually restores own MP.
Potency: 55
Duration: 21s

roleActions.name: Surecast
roleActions.effect:
Spells can be cast without interruption.
Additional Effect: Nullifies most knockback and draw-in effects
Duration: 6s

roleActions.name: Rescue
roleActions.effect: Instantly draws target party member to your side. Cannot be used outside of combat or when target is suffering from certain enfeeblements.

traits.name: Maim and Mend
traits.effect: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 10%.

traits.name: Freecure
traits.effect:
Grants a 15% chance that after casting Cure, the MP cost for your next Cure II will be 0.
Duration: 15s

traits.name: Maim and Mend II
traits.effect: Increases base action damage and HP restoration by 30%.

traits.name: Secret of the Lily
traits.effect: Adds a Lily to your Healing Gauge for every 20 seconds you are engaged in combat, up to a maximum of 3.

traits.name: Stone Mastery II
traits.effect: Upgrades Stone II to Stone III.

traits.name: Stone Mastery III
traits.effect: Upgrades Stone III to Stone IV.

traits.name: Transcendent Afflatus
traits.effect: Adds a Blood Lily to the Healing Gauge that blooms after three uses of Afflatus Solace or Afflatus Rapture.

traits.name: Enhanced Asylum
traits.effect: Adds an additional effect to Asylum that increases HP recovery via healing actions by 10%.

traits.name: Enhanced Healing Magic
traits.effect: Increases the healing potency of Cure to 500, Medica to 400, Cure II to 800, Regen to 250, Cure III to 600, Medica II to 250, Medica II's Regen effect to 150, Afflatus Solace to 800, and Afflatus Rapture to 400.

traits.name: Enhanced Divine Benison
traits.effect:
Allows the accumulation of charges for consecutive uses of Divine Benison.
Maximum Charges: 2
